title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Boomi Agentstudio- Govern Your AI Agents with Agent Control Tower (AIM103)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Boomi Agentstudio- 使用代理控制塔管理您的AI代理 (AIM103)
abstract: Elevate your enterprise AI strategy. In this session, we'll dive into the Boomi Agentstudio, integrated with Amazon Bedrock and Q Business Index, for building, orchestrating, and governing AI agents. We'll show you how to leverage Bedrock services with Boomi to create AI agents that have the business context and multi-system access they need to deliver ROI throughout your business, while ensuring you have complete control via Boomi Agent Control Tower. Discover how to unlock hyperproductivity with Boomi and AWS—accelerating business processes with AI agents that drive action and measurable value. This presentation is brought to you by Boomi, an AWS Partner.
abstract_cn: 提升您的企业AI战略。在本次会议中，我们将深入探讨Boomi Agentstudio，它与Amazon Bedrock和Q Business Index集成，用于构建、编排和治理AI代理。我们将向您展示如何利用Bedrock服务与Boomi创建具有业务上下文和多系统访问能力的AI代理，在整个业务中实现投资回报率，同时通过Boomi Agent Control Tower确保您拥有完全控制权。了解如何通过Boomi和AWS释放超生产力——利用能够驱动行动并产生可衡量价值的AI代理加速业务流程。本演示由AWS合作伙伴Boomi为您呈现。

presenter.name: Thomas Benjamin
presenter.title: SVP of Product Development and AI Engineering

presenter.name: Christopher Hallenbeck
presenter.title: Senior Vice President & General Manager, AI & Platform
